alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; Cameron; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 6:11PM CDT until July 22 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cameron Parish in southwestern Louisiana... South central Jefferson Davis Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 611 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Klondike to Lake Charles, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Grand Lake, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Klondike, Carlyss, Hacketts Corner, Heberts Marina, Lowry, Sweet Lake, Gibbstown, Holmwood, Hackberry and Bell City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 13 and 22. Interstate 210 near mile marker 3. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
